name: Alex Qin
bio: Alex Qin is out here tryna get free. She cares about helping people fulfill the radical visions they have for themselves and the world while working towards more just and equitable futures. She has experience writing code, leading engineering teams, growing communities, developing education programs, teaching, and advocating for underrepresented peoples in tech. These days, she spends her time learning, healing, giving love, and building the Code Cooperative, a community of formerly incarcerated people and advocates who use and build technology as a means of liberation.
